00003         /*
00004          * Parse BGP model specific command line arguments
00005          */
00006 void
00007 bgp_setup_options(int argc, char ** argv)
00008 {
00009         int      i;
00010         int      c;
00011 
00012         optind = 0;
00013         while(-1 != (c = getopt(argc, argv, "-b:")))
00014         {
00015                 switch(c)
00016                 {
00017                         case 'b':
00018                                 g_bgp_init_file = (char *) calloc(255, 1);
00019                                 sprintf(g_bgp_init_file, "%s", optarg);
00020                         break;
00021                 }
00022         }
00023 
00024         g_bgp_state = (bgp_state *) calloc(sizeof(bgp_state), 1);
00025 
00026         g_bgp_as = (bgp_as *) calloc(sizeof(bgp_as) * g_rn_nas, 1);
00027 
00028         if(!g_bgp_as)
00029                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Out of memory!");
00030 
00031         for(i = 0; i < g_rn_nas; i++)
00032                 g_bgp_as[i].degree = (int *) calloc(sizeof(int), g_rn_nas);
00033 
00034         g_bgp_state->b.local_pref = 1;
00035         g_bgp_state->b.as_path = 1;
00036         g_bgp_state->b.origin = 1;
00037         g_bgp_state->b.med = 1;
00038         g_bgp_state->b.hot_potato = 1;
00039         g_bgp_state->b.next_hop = 1;
00040         g_bgp_state->b.existing = 1;
00041 
00042         if(NULL != g_bgp_init_file)
00043         {
00044                 FILE    *init_file;
00045                 int      lp;
00046                 int      ap;
00047                 int      or;
00048                 int      med;
00049                 int      hp;
00050                 int      nh;
00051                 int      ex;
00052 
00053                 init_file = fopen(g_bgp_init_file, "r");
00054 
00055                 if(!init_file)
00056                         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to open BGP4 init file: %s",
00057                                 g_bgp_init_file);
00058 
00059                 fscanf(init_file, "%lf", &g_bgp_state->keepalive_interval);
00060                 fscanf(init_file, "%lf", &g_bgp_state->hold_interval);
00061                 fscanf(init_file, "%lf", &g_bgp_state->mrai_interval);
00062 
00063                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &lp);
00064                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &ap);
00065                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &or);
00066                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &med);
00067                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &hp);
00068                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &nh);
00069                 fscanf(init_file, "%d", &ex);
00070 
00071                 g_bgp_state->b.local_pref = lp;
00072                 g_bgp_state->b.as_path = ap;
00073                 g_bgp_state->b.origin = or;
00074                 g_bgp_state->b.med = med;
00075                 g_bgp_state->b.hot_potato = hp;
00076                 g_bgp_state->b.next_hop = nh;
00077                 g_bgp_state->b.existing = ex;
00078 
00079                 for(i = 0; i < g_rn_nas; i++)
00080                         fscanf(init_file, "%d", &g_bgp_as[i].med);
00081 
00082                 for(i = 0; i < g_rn_nas; i++)
00083                         fscanf(init_file, "%d", &g_bgp_as[i].local_pref);
00084 
00085                 for(i = 0; i < g_rn_nas; i++)
00086                         fscanf(init_file, "%d", &g_bgp_as[i].path_padding);
00087 
00088                 printf("\nBGP Model Variables: %s \n\n", g_bgp_init_file);
00089                 printf("\t%-50s %-11lf\n", "KeepAlive Interval", 
00090                                                 g_bgp_state->keepalive_interval);
00091                 printf("\t%-50s %-11lf\n", "Hold Interval", 
00092                                                 g_bgp_state->hold_interval);
00093                 printf("\t%-50s %-11lf\n", "MRAI", g_bgp_state->mrai_interval);
00094                 printf("\nBGP Decision Algorithm (on=1, off=0): \n");
00095                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "Local Pref", g_bgp_state->b.local_pref);
00096                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "AS Path", g_bgp_state->b.as_path);
00097                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "Origin", g_bgp_state->b.origin);
00098                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "MED", g_bgp_state->b.med);
00099                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "Hot Potato", g_bgp_state->b.hot_potato);
00100                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "Next Hop", g_bgp_state->b.next_hop);
00101                 printf("\t%-50s %-11d\n", "Default", g_bgp_state->b.existing);
00102                 printf("\n");
00103 
00104                 fclose(init_file);
00105         }
00106 }

00108 void
00109 bgp_setup_ases()
00110 {
00111         rn_as           *as = NULL;
00112 
00113         char            expr[255];
00114         int             i;
00115 
00116         g_bgp_ases = (xmlXPathObjectPtr *) calloc(sizeof(xmlXPathObjectPtr), g_rn_nas);
00117 
00118         if(!g_bgp_ases)
00119                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Out of memory!");
00120 
00121         i = 0;
00122         while(NULL != (as = rn_nextas(as)))
00123         {
00124                 as->keepalive_interval = g_bgp_state->keepalive_interval;
00125                 as->hold_interval = g_bgp_state->hold_interval;
00126                 as->mrai_interval = g_bgp_state->mrai_interval;
00127 
00128                 sprintf(expr, 
00129                         "/rossnet/as[@id=\'%d\']/area/subnet/node/stream[@port=\'169\']", 
00130                         as->id);
00131 
00132                 g_bgp_ases[as->id] = xpath(expr, ctxt);
00133 
00134                 printf("\tAS %d: iBGP nbr load: %d^2 = %d, MED %d, LOCAL_PREF %d, AS PATH Padding %d\n",
00135                         as->id, g_bgp_ases[as->id]->nodesetval->nodeNr,
00136                         g_bgp_ases[as->id]->nodesetval->nodeNr *
00137                         g_bgp_ases[as->id]->nodesetval->nodeNr, 
00138                         g_bgp_as[as->id].med, 
00139                         g_bgp_as[as->id].local_pref,
00140                         g_bgp_as[as->id].path_padding);
00141         }
00142 
00143         printf("\n");
00144 }

00146 void
00147 bgp_main(int argc, char **argv, char **env)
00148 {
00149         /*
00150          * Init the memory buffers for this model
00151          */
00152 #if BGP_CONVERGED
00153         char            file[1024];
00154 #endif
00155 
00156         tw_kp          *kp;
00157         int             i;
00158 
00159         printf("\nInitializing BGP memory buffers... ");
00160         for (i = 0; i < g_tw_nkp; i++)
00161         {
00162                 kp = tw_getkp(i);
00163 
00164 /*
00165                 // Commented out for NCS
00166                 g_bgp_fd_rtes = tw_kp_memory_init(kp, 1000 * g_tw_nlp, sizeof(bgp_route), 1);
00167                 g_bgp_fd_asp = tw_kp_memory_init(kp, 1000 * g_tw_nlp, sizeof(int), 1);
00168                 g_bgp_fd = tw_kp_memory_init(kp, 2000 * g_tw_nlp, sizeof(bgp_message), 1);
00169 */
00170                 g_bgp_fd_rtes = tw_kp_memory_init(kp, g_tw_nlp, sizeof(bgp_route), 1);
00171                 g_bgp_fd_asp = tw_kp_memory_init(kp, g_tw_nlp, sizeof(int), 1);
00172                 g_bgp_fd = tw_kp_memory_init(kp, g_tw_nlp, sizeof(bgp_message), 1);
00173         }
00174 
00175         printf("done!\n");
00176 
00177 /*
00178         printf("\tRoute   q: %10ld bufs %10ld fd\n", 1000 * g_tw_nlp, g_bgp_fd_rtes);
00179         printf("\tAS Path q: %10ld bufs %10ld fd\n", 1000 * g_tw_nlp, g_bgp_fd_asp);
00180         printf("\tMessage q: %10ld bufs %10ld fd\n", 1000 * g_tw_nlp, g_bgp_fd);
00181 */
00182         printf("\tRoute   q: %10lld bufs %10ld fd\n", g_tw_nlp, g_bgp_fd_rtes);
00183         printf("\tAS Path q: %10lld bufs %10ld fd\n", g_tw_nlp, g_bgp_fd_asp);
00184         printf("\tMessage q: %10lld bufs %10ld fd\n", g_tw_nlp, g_bgp_fd);
00185         printf("\n");
00186 
00187         bgp_setup_options(argc, argv);
00188         bgp_setup_ases();
00189 
00190 #if BGP_CONVERGED
00191         sprintf(file, "tools/%s/bgp-route.file", g_rn_tools_dir);
00192         g_bgp_rt_fd = fopen(file, "r");
00193 
00194         if(!g_bgp_rt_fd)
00195                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to open BGP routing file: %s", file);
00196 #else
00197 /*
00198         sprintf(file, "%s/bgp-route.file", g_rn_logs_dir);
00199         g_bgp_rt_fd = fopen(file, "w");
00200 
00201         if(!g_bgp_rt_fd)
00202                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to open file: %s!", file);
00203 */
00204 #endif
00205 }

00207 void
00208 bgp_md_final()
00209 {
00210         int      i;
00211         int      j;
00212 
00213         printf("\nBGP4 Model Statistics: \n\n");
00214 
00215         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Connects", g_bgp_stats.s_nconnects);
00216         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Connects Dropped", g_bgp_stats.s_nconnects_dropped);
00217         printf("\n");
00218         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Opens", g_bgp_stats.s_nopens);
00219         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "D Opens", g_bgp_stats.d_opens);
00220         printf("\n");
00221         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Routes Added", g_bgp_stats.s_nroute_adds);
00222         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Routes Removed", g_bgp_stats.s_nroute_removes);
00223         printf("\n");
00224         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Updates Sent", g_bgp_stats.s_nupdates_sent);
00225         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Updates Recv", g_bgp_stats.s_nupdates_recv);
00226         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Update Unreachable", g_bgp_stats.s_nunreachable);
00227         printf("\n");
00228         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Notify Sent", g_bgp_stats.s_nnotify_sent);
00229         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Notify Recv", g_bgp_stats.s_nnotify_recv);
00230         printf("\n");
00231         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Keepalives", g_bgp_stats.s_nkeepalives);
00232         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Keepalive Timers", g_bgp_stats.s_nkeepalivetimers);
00233         printf("\n");
00234         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "MRAI Timers", g_bgp_stats.s_nmrai_timers);
00235         printf("\n");
00236         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "iBGP Neighbors Down", g_bgp_stats.s_nibgp_nbrs);
00237         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "eBGP Neighbors Down", g_bgp_stats.s_nebgp_nbrs);
00238         printf("\n");
00239         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "iBGP Neighbors Up", g_bgp_stats.s_nibgp_nbrs_up);
00240         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "eBGP Neighbors Up", g_bgp_stats.s_nebgp_nbrs_up);
00241         printf("\n");
00242         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: Local Pref", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_local_pref);
00243         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: AS Path", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_aspath);
00244         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: Origin", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_origin);
00245         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: MED", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_med);
00246         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: Hot Potato", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_hot_potato);
00247         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: Next Hop", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_next_hop);
00248         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: Existing", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_existing);
00249         printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Decision: Default", g_bgp_stats.s_ndec_default);
00250         printf("\n");
00251         printf("BGP Caused Updates: %d\n", g_bgp_stats.s_cause_bgp);
00252         printf("OSPF Caused BGP Updates: %d", g_bgp_stats.s_cause_ospf);
00253         printf("\n");
00254 
00255         printf("BGP4 Topology: \n\n");
00256 
00257         for(i = 0; i < g_rn_nas; i++)
00258         {
00259                 for(j = 0; j < g_rn_nas; j++)
00260                         printf("%10d ", g_bgp_as[i].degree[j]);
00261 
00262                 printf("\n");
00263         }
00264 
00265         if(0 && g_bgp_rt_fd)
00266                 fclose(g_bgp_rt_fd);
00267 }
